content.query:
WITH rides AS
(
    SELECT TOP 100 * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/partners/Hogia/PARQUET/monitoredvehiclejourneysdomain/MonitoredVehicleJourneys/part-00000-e8ed2dfb-c5e8-4226-8e23-adea29ef229d-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [MyRides]
),
MonitoredVehicleJourneys AS
(
    SELECT TOP 100 * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/partners/Hogia/PARQUET/vehiclejourneysdomain/265581f3-17e5-4d58-bba1-a97b00dfcf96/part-00000-f99164b1-96c2-46ce-afc3-17461858c76f-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
               
)
SELECT
*
FROM rides r
JOIN MonitoredVehicleJourneys MVJ on r.objectref = MVJ.objectref and r.operatingdaydate = MVJ.operatingdaydate
--ORDER BY current_day ASC
